author: roger
msg: THRIFT-1489 Add support for WCF bindings (optionally) to C# compiler, allowing web service usage of Thrift generated code
- use ServiceModel, DataContract only when wcf is enabled

msg: configure: Improve the error message when --with-included-apr is specified
but either APR or APR-Util is not included.
